Game.Name: Dragon Ball Z - Collectible Card Game (USA)
Game.plot: The Dragonball Z Collectible Trading Card Game (CCG) puts you in command of the most powerful warriors ever, in the battle for Earth. The DBZgame is a collectible trading card game, like the Harry Potter TCG and the Young Jedi CCG. But this one features all your fave Dragonball Z fighters - Goku, Gohan, Piccolo, Vegeta, Android 17 and even the big bad dude himself - Cell. You play by choosing your Dragonball Z warrior and battling against friends who have their own Dragonball Z CCG cards. Cheat: Unlock hidden charactersReach Lv5 and beat Cell using a specific character as your Main Personality to unlock a hidden character. (You will receive this character's Main Personality lv1-3 cards inside the booster pack after battle):
Game.Notes: Deal! Draw! Conquer! Based on the Collectible Card Game from Score Entertainment. The Dragon Ball ZÂ® Collectible Card Game allows players to utilize a ladder fighting system to defeat opponents and finally -- Cell himself! Players "unlock" new characters as they use strategies and power to save the Universe from complete and utter destruction!
